title: Project Big Fork and the Disconvergence
author: VD
content_html:
If you’d like to take part in the Open Brainstorm session tonight in which I’ll be announcing Project Big Fork to the Ilk and discuss the Disconvergence with two other pioneers in the Alt-Tech movement, you can register here. There are 1,000 seats, but they are filling up fast.

The event will take place at 7 PM Eastern tonight.
content_text:
